en.description: Information Engineering fresh graduate from Pamulang University with a background in Front-End Development. While my academic projects centered on creating responsive web interfaces, I have discovered a strong passion for Data Analytics. I am currently honing my skills in data processing and visualization, aiming to bridge the gap between technical infrastructure and business intelligence.
I am a lifelong learner, adaptable to new technologies, and ready to contribute as a data-driven professional in the tech industry.
